name: Haywire Island
description:
A quick puzzle game with a glitchy twist.  Place buildings and facilities to promote guest happiness, but know that you're racing against the fundamental decay of the universe.

This game was made in a weekend, for MiniJam #50.

The music is procedurally generated, using Kevin Ennis's TinyMusic library (https://github.com/kevincennis/TinyMusic)
